flawed_nl_solution:
Leah spent 28 / 7 = $<<28/7=4>>4 on a milkshake.
She had 28 - 4 = $<<28-4=22>>22 left.
She put half in her savings account and half in her wallet, so she had 22 / 2 = $<<22/2=11>>11 in her wallet.
Her dog shredded all the money in her wallet but $1, so Leah lost 11 - 1 = $<<11-1=10>>10.
#### 10

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 24, not 22. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
